Package index

Getting started

galah_call() request_data() request_metadata() request_files()
Start building a query
galah_config()
Get or set configuration options that control galah behaviour
show_all() show_all_apis() show_all_assertions() show_all_atlases() show_all_collections() show_all_datasets() show_all_fields() show_all_licences() show_all_lists() show_all_profiles() show_all_providers() show_all_ranks() show_all_reasons() stable
Show valid record information
search_all() search_assertions() search_apis() search_atlases() search_collections() search_datasets() search_fields() search_identifiers() search_licences() search_lists() search_profiles() search_providers() search_ranks() search_reasons() search_taxa() stable
Search for record information
show_values() search_values()
Show or search for values within a specified field

Amend a query

apply_profile() galah_apply_profile()
Apply a data quality profile
arrange(<data_request>) arrange(<metadata_request>) experimental
Order rows using column values
count(<data_request>)
Count the observations in each group
desc() unnest()
Non-generic tidyverse functions
filter(<data_request>) filter(<metadata_request>) filter(<files_request>) galah_filter()
Keep rows that match a condition
geolocate() galah_geolocate() galah_polygon() galah_bbox() galah_radius() st_crop(<data_request>) experimental
Narrow a query to within a specified area
group_by(<data_request>) galah_group_by()
Group by one or more variables
identify(<data_request>) identify(<metadata_request>) galah_identify()
Narrow a query by passing taxonomic identifiers
select(<data_request>) galah_select()
Keep or drop columns using their names
slice_head(<data_request>) slice_head(<metadata_request>) experimental
Subset rows using their positions
reexports arrange collect compute collapse identify filter select group_by slice_head count st_crop
Objects exported from other packages

Execute a query via API

collapse(<data_request>) collapse(<metadata_request>) collapse(<files_request>)
Generate a query
compute(<data_request>) compute(<metadata_request>) compute(<files_request>) compute(<query>)
Compute a query
collect(<data_request>) collect(<metadata_request>) collect(<files_request>) collect(<query>) collect(<computed_query>)
Retrieve a database query
atlas_occurrences() atlas_counts() atlas_species() atlas_media() atlas_taxonomy()
Retrieve a database query
collect_media()
Collect media files

Miscellaneous functions

taxonomic_searches
Look up taxon information
print(<data_request>) print(<files_request>) print(<metadata_request>) print(<query>) print(<computed_query>) print(<query_set>) print(<galah_config>)
Print galah objects
atlas_citation()
Generate a citation for occurrence data
